result.eng: Children of school-leaving age.
result.ga: páistí atá in aois fágála scoile
result.orig: Páistí atá in aois fágála scoile
result.html: páistí atá in aois fágála scoileChildren of school-leaving age.
result.ponchtml: páistí atá in aois fágála scoileChildren of school-leaving age.

result.eng: I was ill, so I could not go to school.
result.ga: bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoil
result.orig: Bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoil
result.html: bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoilI was ill, so I could not go to school.
result.ponchtml: ḃí mé tinn mar sin níorḃ ḟéidir liom dul ar scoilI was ill, so I could not go to school.

result.eng: She detained the children after school.
result.ga: choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoile
result.orig: Choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoile
result.html: choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoileShe detained the children after school.
result.ponchtml: ċoimeád sí na páistí i ndiaiḋ am scoileShe detained the children after school.

result.eng: How does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?
result.ga: conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoil
result.orig: Conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoil

result.ponchtml: conas a ullṁaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taoḃ amuiġ den scoilHow does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?

result.eng: The school was founded in 1990.
result.ga: cuireadh an scoil ar bun i 1990
result.orig: Cuireadh an scoil ar bun i 1990
result.html: cuireadh an scoil ar bun i 1990The school was founded in 1990.
result.ponchtml: cuireaḋ an scoil ar bun i 1990The school was founded in 1990.

result.eng: I left school full of hopes.
result.ga: d'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchais
result.orig: D'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchais
result.html: d'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchaisI left school full of hopes.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóċaisI left school full of hopes.

result.eng: My favourite subject at school is mathematics.
result.ga: is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoil
result.orig: Is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoil
result.html: is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoilMy favourite subject at school is mathematics.
result.ponchtml: is í an ṁatamaitic an t-áḃar is ansa liom ar scoilMy favourite subject at school is mathematics.

result.eng: They teach languages in this school.
result.ga: múintear teangacha sa scoil seo
result.orig: Múintear teangacha sa scoil seo
result.html: múintear teangacha sa scoil seoThey teach languages in this school.
result.ponchtml: múintear teangaċa sa scoil seoThey teach languages in this school.

result.eng: I haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ga: níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil
result.orig: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil
result.html: níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoilI haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ponchtml: níor laḃair mé léi ó d'ḟág muid an scoilI haven't spoken to her since we left school.

result.eng: She started going to school when she was seven years of age.
result.ga: thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aois
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aois
result.html: thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aoisShe started going to school when she was seven years of age.
result.ponchtml: ṫosaiġ sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a ḃí sí seaċt mbliana d'aoisShe started going to school when she was seven years of age.

result.eng: The school has been in temporary accommodation for a year.
result.ga: tá an scoil i gcóiríocht shealadach le bliain
result.orig: Tá an scoil i gcóiríocht shealadach le bliain
result.html: tá an scoil i gcóiríocht shealadach le bliainThe school has been in temporary accommodation for a year.
result.ponchtml: tá an scoil i gcóiríoċt ẛealadaċ le bliainThe school has been in temporary accommodation for a year.

result.eng: The children are at school.
result.ga: tá na páistí ar scoil
result.orig: Tá na páistí ar scoil
result.html: tá na páistí ar scoilThe children are at school.
result.ponchtml: tá na páistí ar scoilThe children are at school.

result.eng: It's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.
result.ga: tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoil
result.orig: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoil
result.html: tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoilIt's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.
result.ponchtml: tá sé beagnaċ a naoi a ċlog caiṫfiḋ mé dul ar scoilIt's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.

result.eng: The two of them are at school.
result.ga: tá an bheirt acu ar scoil
result.orig: Tá an bheirt acu ar scoil
result.html: tá an bheirt acu ar scoilThe two of them are at school.
result.ponchtml: tá an ḃeirt acu ar scoilThe two of them are at school.

result.eng: Do you play music at school?

result.html: an gcasann tú sa scoilDo you play music at school?
result.ponchtml: an gcasann tú sa scoilDo you play music at school?

result.eng: I go to school at 9.20.
result.ga: téim ar scoil ag fiche tar éis a naoi

result.html: téim ar scoil ag fiche tar éis a naoiI go to school at 9.20.
result.ponchtml: téim ar scoil ag fiċe tar éis a naoiI go to school at 9.20.

result.eng: What time do you leave school?

result.ponchtml: cén t-am a ḃfágann tú an scoilWhat time do you leave school?

result.eng: There are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
result.ga: tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámha
result.orig: Tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann Tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámha
result.html: tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámhaThere are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
result.ponchtml: tá áiseanna den ċéad scoṫ ann tá siopaí maiṫe ann oifig an ṗoist scoileanna banc agus linn snáṁaThere are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.

result.eng: The pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ga: bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.orig: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.html: bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ponchtml: ḃí na daltaí ag foġlaim faoi stair an ċine ġoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.

result.eng: He was sent to school.
result.ga: cuireadh chun na scoile é
result.orig: Cuireadh chun na scoile é
result.html: cuireadh chun na scoile éHe was sent to school.
result.ponchtml: cuireaḋ ċun na scoile éHe was sent to school.

result.eng: His mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ga: chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.orig: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.html: chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ponchtml: ċuaiġ sé lena ṁáṫair ar ġreim láiṁe go teaċ na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.

result.eng: Upon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.
result.ga: ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de
result.orig: Ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de
result.html: ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh deUpon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.
result.ponchtml: ar a ḋul isteaċ go teaċ na scoile dó d'aṁarc sé go scaollṁar ar gaċ taoḃ deUpon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.

result.eng: He hated school and books with a passion.
result.ga: bhí fuath na námhad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leabhra
result.orig: Bhí fuath na námhad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leabhra
result.html: bhí fuath na námhad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leabhraHe hated school and books with a passion.
result.ponchtml: ḃí fuaṫ na náṁad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leaḃraHe hated school and books with a passion.

result.eng: I guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ga: is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.orig: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.html: is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ponchtml: is cosúil go ḃfuil sé de ḃuaiḋ orṫu a ḃeiṫ tugṫa don ġloine mar ṁáistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.

result.eng: That's where the school master was lodging.
result.ga: b'ann a bhí máistir na scoile ar ceathrúin
result.orig: B'ann a bhí máistir na scoile ar ceathrúin
result.html: b'ann a bhí máistir na scoile ar ceathrúinThat's where the school master was lodging.
result.ponchtml: b'ann a ḃí máistir na scoile ar ceaṫrúinThat's where the school master was lodging.

result.eng: They gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ga: thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.orig: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.html: thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ponchtml: ṫug siad scoil agus léann doṁ ar feaḋ a n-acṁainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
